author: philip
msg: Make the command client use a wrapper function when calling a deprecated
function to avoid a compiler warning.

author: acmurthy
msg: Merge -c 1467244 from trunk to branch-2.0.4-alpha to fix YARN-412. Fixed FifoScheduler to check hostname of a NodeManager rather than its host:port during scheduling which caused incorrect locality for containers. Contributed by Roger Hoover.

author: acmurthy
